titles.title: Medicaid Women's Basic Health Coverage Act of 1995
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require State medicaid programs to provide coverage of screening mammography and screening pap smears.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Medicaid Women's Basic Health Coverage Act of 1995 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide State Medicaid coverage of: (1) screening mammographies for women age 35 and older conducted in accordance with the frequency guidelines established by the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 for coverage of screening mammographies under the Medicare program (title XVIII of the Social Security Act); and (2) screening pap smears.
